articles.description: The development is a dampener for Cipla, which planned to launch Abraxane, a high-value drug used to treat pancreatic cancer, in Q4.
articles.content: Cipla Ltds shares have declined 4% after saying last week that the US Food and Drug Administration found its plant in Goa did not meet norms and issued Form 483 to the company. While this does not af… [+2805 chars]

articles.title: AWS announces first space tech accelerator program in India with 24 shortlisted startups - BusinessLine
articles.description: AWS Space Accelerator: India program supports 24 space tech startups with training, mentoring, and funding opportunities in 14 weeks.
articles.content:
Twenty-four  space tech startups have been shortlisted to participate in Amazon Web Services (AWS) first space tech accelerator program in India - Space Accelerator: India.
